specials.name: Poison
specials.text: Your Opponents pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

specials.name: Bad Execution
specials.text: This attack is not affected by weakness or resistance.

specials.name: Confusion
specials.text: Before your Opponents next attack they flip a coin. If Heads their active pokemon takes 2 damage before attacking.

specials.name: Paralyzed
specials.text: Before your Opponents next attack they flip a coin. If Heads their attack does -2 damage.

specials.name: Burn
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

specials.name: Recharging
specials.text: Your Pokemon does nothing on your next turn.

specials.name: Perish Song
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon is cursed and will faint in 5 turns from this attack. Your Pokemon cannot switch out or attack until this effect ends.

specials.name: Infatuation
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon's next attack does -1 damage.

specials.name: Power Boost
specials.text: This attack does +2 damage. Your Opponents Pokemon's next attack does +3 damage.

specials.name: Splash
specials.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

specials.name: Primed
specials.text: This attack does +1 damage.

specials.name: Seeded
specials.text: Your Opponent's Pokemon takes 1 damage in between turns. This Pokemon gains +1 HP.

specials.name: Getting Pumped
specials.text: For every consecutive attack with 'Getting Pumped' add +1 damage to your next attack.

specials.name: Self Destructive
specials.text: This ATK does +2 damage. Your Pokemon takes 3 damage.

specials.name: Roost
specials.text: Your pokemon heals for +2 health.

specials.name: Reversal
specials.text: On this battles first attack, if your speed is slower than your opponent this attack does +5 damage.

specials.name: Sleep
specials.text: Your Opponent's Pokemon is now asleep.

specials.name: Rest
specials.text: This Pokemon is now asleep.

specials.name: Lackluster
specials.text: This ATK does -1 damage. This Pokemon heals for 1 HP.

specials.name: Joker
specials.text: Flip a coin. If Heads deal +3 damage. If Tails, this Pokemon takes 5 damage.

specials.name: Froggy
specials.text: After this attack does damage. Switch out this pokemon.

specials.name: Oblivious Rage
specials.text: If this Pokemon took damage last turn this attack does nothing.

specials.name: Payback
specials.text: If this Pokemon took damage last turn this attack does +1 damage.

specials.name: Glass Cannon
specials.text: If this Pokemon took damage last turn this attack does -2 damage.

specials.name: Strong Affliction
specials.text: If this Pokemon is affected by a status condition, this attack does +2 damage.

specials.name: Down But Not Out
specials.text: If this Pokemon has 5 or less HP left this attack does +3 damage.

specials.name: Execute
specials.text: If your Opponents Pokemon has 3 or less HP left, this Atk Defeats that Pokemon.

specials.name: Biding Time
specials.text: This ATK cannot be used if your Opponents Pokemon has 10 or more HP left.

specials.name: First Strike
specials.text: If your Opponents Pokemon has no damage, this ATK does +2 damage.

specials.name: Watcher
specials.text: If your Opponents Pokemon has no damage, this Pokemon cannot use this ATK.

specials.name: Chilling Rein
specials.text: If this Pokemon is affected by a status condition, this ATK does +3 damage.

specials.name: Lucky
specials.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This ATK does +1 for every heads.

specials.name: Unlucky
specials.text: Flip a coin until you get heads. This ATK does -1 for every tails.

specials.name: Greedy
specials.text: If this Pokemon has a Held Item, this ATK does -2 damage.

specials.name: Pacifist
specials.text: If this Pokemon does not have a Held Item, this ATK does +1 damage.
